title: Acute effects of prismatic adaptation on penalty kick accuracy and postural control in young soccer players: A pilot study
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Valerio Giustino, Rosario Emanuele Bonaventura, Giuseppe Messina, Antonino Patti, Guglielmo Pillitteri, Simona Pajaujiene, Antonio Paoli, Antonio Palma, Antonino Bianco, Massimiliano Oliveri, Giuseppe Battaglia
